comments.html: I think with "Cisco QFX" he meant Cisco QuantumFlow Processor (QFP). "QFX" is from another vendor.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: that happens when marketing wins over engineering, and both the vendor you mentioned are the champions in this. it's time for someone (like Ivan) to explain you can't do things on a shoestring.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: For some additional historical context, similar to this L2/L3 demarcation there was the convergence of "Service Delivery Platforms" and "Edge Routers" around 2002: https://www.lightreading.com/ethernet-ip/edge-routing-gets-service-friendly/d/d-id/581040
comments.name: Jeroen van Bemmel
